snippet: The head of the United States Central Command indicated that even if the Islamic State managed to take Kobani, the victory would be costly to the group.
lead_paragraph: The head of the United States Central Command indicated that even if the Islamic State managed to take Kobani, the victory would be costly to the group.

headline.main: U.S. Commander Reports Heavy ISIS Losses in Syrian City of Kobani
